alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Iberia; Lafayette; Rapides; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 8:14AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, Lafayette, southeastern Rapides, eastern Evangeline, eastern Acadia, northeastern Vermilion, west central St. Martin, southwestern Avoyelles and St. Landry Parishes through 845 AM CDT... At 814 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cottonport to near Opelousas to near Ridge to near Henry. Movement was northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Opelousas, Crowley, Abbeville, Eunice, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Rayne, Carencro, Ville Platte, Kaplan, Church Point, Bunkie, Mamou, Leonville, Arnaudville, Moreauville, Cheneyville and Turkey Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 81 and 111. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Iberia; Lafayette; Rapides; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
